Marketing Glossary

Digital marketing terminology explained in plain English. No jargon, just clear explanations.

Digital marketing is full of acronyms and technical terms that can be confusing. We've put together this glossary to help construction company owners understand the key concepts that matter for growing their business online.

SEO

What is SEO?

Search Engine Optimization (SEO) is the practice of improving your website to increase its visibility in search engines like Google.

Read Full Article PPC

What is PPC?

Pay-Per-Click (PPC) is an advertising model where you pay each time someone clicks on your ad.

Read Full Article Local SEO

What is Local SEO?

Local SEO optimizes your online presence to attract customers from local searches like "contractor near me."

Read Full Article Content Marketing

What is Content Marketing?

Content marketing is creating and sharing valuable content to attract and engage your target audience.

Read Full Article Social Media Marketing

What is Social Media Marketing?

Social media marketing uses platforms like Facebook and Instagram to promote your business and engage with customers.

Read Full Article Google Ads

What is Google Ads?

Google Ads is Google's advertising platform that lets you display ads in search results and across the web.

Read Full Article Web Design

What is Web Design?

Web design encompasses the visual appearance, layout, and user experience of your website.

Read Full Article Responsive Design

What is Responsive Design?

Responsive design ensures your website looks and works great on all devices, from phones to desktops.

Read Full Article Conversion Rate

What is Conversion Rate?

Conversion rate is the percentage of website visitors who take a desired action, like filling out a contact form.

Read Full Article Lead Generation

What is Lead Generation?

Lead generation is the process of attracting and converting potential customers who are interested in your services.

Read Full Article
